channel.title: How do you make a command?
channel.description: I had in another source when i typed ::phats it would work but i totally forgot how to do it. Anyknow know how?

item.title: How do you make a command?
item.dc:creator: @bmnevil bmnevil
item.description:
@bmnevil wrote:

Open up your client. java and search for this

if (command.startsWith

you should see something like this

[code]“food”) && playerRights >= 1)
{
addItem(385, 100);

		}[/code] or something like that

you can erase that stuff and enter this

[code]
if (command.startsWith(“enter what you want command name to be here”) && playerRights >= 1
{
addItem(put item id then comma then number of that item);

		}[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: How do you make a command?
